GE07bhgce__u:462: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api
GE07bhgce__u:464: yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm
GE07bhgce__u:467: navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan

GE07bhgce__u:470: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07bhgce__u:472: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:477: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:478: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:479: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:480: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam
GE07bhgce__u:482: bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham
GE07bhgce__u:484: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te
GE07bhgce__u:485: ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:487: kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:494: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ
GE07bhgce__u:497: vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:499: suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati
GE07bhgce__u:501: anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:502: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:503: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava
GE07bhgce__u:504: na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaś cana
GE07bhgce__u:505: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:507: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate
GE07bhgce__u:510: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:518: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate
GE07bhgce__u:519: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:521: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:528: manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:531: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:536: niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā
GE07bhgce__u:537: yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā
GE07bhgce__u:541: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam
GE07bhgce__u:542: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:543: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:544: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate
GE07bhgce__u:550: ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃ cid api cintayet
GE07bhgce__u:551: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
GE07bhgce__u:552: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
GE07bhgce__u:553: praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam
GE07bhgce__u:559: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati
GE07bhgce__u:560: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati
GE07bhgce__u:561: sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:562: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate
GE07bhgce__u:564: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:566: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana
GE07bhgce__u:567: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām
GE07bhgce__u:568: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham
GE07bhgce__u:569: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram
GE07bhgce__u:572: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate
GE07bhgce__u:573: asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:577: aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati
GE07bhgce__u:580: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:581: tvad anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate
GE07bhgce__u:583: pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate
GE07bhgce__u:584: na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaś cid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati
GE07bhgce__u:585: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:587: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām
GE07bhgce__u:588: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam
GE07bhgce__u:590: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana
GE07bhgce__u:591: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:596: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna
GE07bhgce__u:598: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:600: mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:601: asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:602: jñānaṃ te 'haṃ savijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:603: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate
GE07bhgce__u:604: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye
GE07bhgce__u:605: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:606: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:607: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā
GE07bhgce__u:608: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām
GE07bhgce__u:611: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:612: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti dhanaṃjaya
GE07bhgce__u:613: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
GE07bhgce__u:615: praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu
GE07bhgce__u:616: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau
GE07bhgce__u:618: bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam
GE07bhgce__u:619: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07bhgce__u:622: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye
GE07bhgce__u:623: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi
GE07bhgce__u:624: tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07bhgce__u:625: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:626: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā
GE07bhgce__u:627: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te
GE07bhgce__u:628: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:631: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha
GE07bhgce__u:633: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:634: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam
GE07bhgce__u:635: āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:636: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate
GE07bhgce__u:637: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:639: taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā
GE07bhgce__u:640: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati
GE07bhgce__u:641: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham
GE07bhgce__u:642: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate
GE07bhgce__u:643: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān
GE07bhgce__u:644: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām
GE07bhgce__u:645: devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api
GE07bhgce__u:646: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:649: mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:651: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaś cana
GE07bhgce__u:654: yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07bhgce__u:657: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07bhgce__u:658: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ
GE07bhgce__u:659: prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ

GE07bhgce__u:662: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:670: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram

GE07bhgce__u:673: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:674: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca
GE07bhgce__u:685: sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam
GE07bhgce__u:690: sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca
GE07bhgce__u:692: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran
GE07bhgce__u:693: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:694: ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:699: mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate
GE07bhgce__u:704: bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate

GE07bhgce__u:708: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:709: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07bhgce__u:710: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā
GE07bhgce__u:711: yasyāntaḥsthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07bhgce__u:712: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:713: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha
GE07bhgce__u:714: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam
GE07bhgce__u:715: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:716: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam
GE07bhgce__u:717: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate
GE07bhgce__u:718: śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate
GE07bhgce__u:720: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaś cana
GE07bhgce__u:727: idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave
GE07bhgce__u:733: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā

GE07bhgce__u:747: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam
GE07bhgce__u:750: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ

GE07bhgce__u:753: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:754: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:755: jñānayajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:757: ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham
GE07bhgce__u:758: mantro 'ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam
GE07bhgce__u:759: pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:760: vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:761: gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt
GE07bhgce__u:762: prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:763: tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛhṇāmy utsṛjāmi ca
GE07bhgce__u:764: amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna
GE07bhgce__u:773: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:776: te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhipūrvakam
GE07bhgce__u:777: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:778: na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te
GE07bhgce__u:779: yānti devavratā devān pitṝn yānti pitṛvratāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:780: bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājino 'pi mām

GE07bhgce__u:783: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat
GE07bhgce__u:784: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam
GE07bhgce__u:787: samo 'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:788: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham
GE07bhgce__u:789: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk
GE07bhgce__u:790: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:792: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati
GE07bhgce__u:793: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:794: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:795: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:796: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām
GE07bhgce__u:797: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
GE07bhgce__u:800: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:802: na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:803: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:804: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:806: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:807: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:808: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:809: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:810: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:811: madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:812: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:814: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
GE07bhgce__u:815: iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:817: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca
GE07bhgce__u:819: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te
GE07bhgce__u:823: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān
GE07bhgce__u:824: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum
GE07bhgce__u:825: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:826: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me
GE07bhgce__u:827: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava
GE07bhgce__u:828: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:831: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:832: yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi
GE07bhgce__u:833: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan
GE07bhgce__u:834: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā
GE07bhgce__u:836: bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam
GE07bhgce__u:838: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:839: prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me
GE07bhgce__u:841: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca

GE07bhgce__u:847: vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham
GE07bhgce__u:848: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim
GE07bhgce__u:849: senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:850: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram
GE07bhgce__u:856: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk
GE07bhgce__u:857: prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:858: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham
GE07bhgce__u:859: pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham
GE07bhgce__u:860: prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham
GE07bhgce__u:861: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām
GE07bhgce__u:862: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham
GE07bhgce__u:863: jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī
GE07bhgce__u:864: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna
GE07bhgce__u:868: mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām
GE07bhgce__u:869: kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
GE07bhgce__u:870: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham
GE07bhgce__u:872: dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07bhgce__u:875: munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ
GE07bhgce__u:876: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām
GE07bhgce__u:877: maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham
GE07bhgce__u:878: yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna
GE07bhgce__u:879: na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram
GE07bhgce__u:881: eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā
GE07bhgce__u:882: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā
GE07bhgce__u:883: tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejoṃśasaṃbhavam
GE07bhgce__u:884: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna
GE07bhgce__u:885: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat
GE07bhgce__u:888: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama
GE07bhgce__u:889: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā
GE07bhgce__u:891: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara
GE07bhgce__u:892: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama
GE07bhgce__u:893: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho
GE07bhgce__u:894: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam
GE07bhgce__u:896: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:898: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:901: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi
GE07bhgce__u:902: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā
GE07bhgce__u:903: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:905: evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ
GE07bhgce__u:906: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:912: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:921: ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān
GE07bhgce__u:924: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ;
GE07bhgce__u:957: dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo
GE07bhgce__u:960: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma;
GE07bhgce__u:995: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca;
GE07bhgce__u:997: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā;
GE07bhgce__u:1009: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman;
GE07bhgce__u:1012: tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat
GE07bhgce__u:1015: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma;
GE07bhgce__u:1020: punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te
GE07bhgce__u:1026: he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07bhgce__u:1034: tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān
GE07bhgce__u:1043: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ;
GE07bhgce__u:1053: yan me tvad anyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam
GE07bhgce__u:1055: na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1058: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo;
GE07bhgce__u:1061: tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya
GE07bhgce__u:1068: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana
GE07bhgce__u:1069: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1071: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama
GE07bhgce__u:1072: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1073: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā
GE07bhgce__u:1074: śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā
GE07bhgce__u:1075: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna
GE07bhgce__u:1076: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07bhgce__u:1078: nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava
GE07bhgce__u:1080: evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:1081: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1083: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:1084: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1085: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:1086: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07bhgce__u:1088: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1090: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate
GE07bhgce__u:1091: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1095: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya
GE07bhgce__u:1096: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1097: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram
GE07bhgce__u:1100: madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi
GE07bhgce__u:1101: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1103: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07bhgce__u:1105: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1108: mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1109: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1110: harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1112: sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1113: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati
GE07bhgce__u:1114: śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1115: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāvamānayoḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1117: tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kena cit
GE07bhgce__u:1118: aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1119: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07bhgce__u:1120: śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1122: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate
GE07bhgce__u:1123: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1124: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:1125: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama
GE07bhgce__u:1126: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yadvikāri yataś ca yat
GE07bhgce__u:1127: sa ca yo yatprabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:1128: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak
GE07bhgce__u:1130: mahābhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1132: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1143: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā
GE07bhgce__u:1144: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute
GE07bhgce__u:1145: anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:1149: asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca
GE07bhgce__u:1150: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1151: sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat
GE07bhgce__u:1152: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam
GE07bhgce__u:1153: bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca
GE07bhgce__u:1154: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:1155: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
GE07bhgce__u:1156: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1158: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api
GE07bhgce__u:1159: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān
GE07bhgce__u:1162: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān
GE07bhgce__u:1165: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1166: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha
GE07bhgce__u:1168: dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā
GE07bhgce__u:1170: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate
GE07bhgce__u:1172: yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃ cit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07bhgce__u:1175: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07bhgce__u:1176: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:1177: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:1179: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati
GE07bhgce__u:1181: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07bhgce__u:1183: śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate
GE07bhgce__u:1186: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1187: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:1189: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param
GE07bhgce__u:1191: paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07bhgce__u:1192: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1193: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1194: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca
GE07bhgce__u:1195: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham
GE07bhgce__u:1198: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā
GE07bhgce__u:1199: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1205: tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām
GE07bhgce__u:1207: sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:1208: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayaty uta
GE07bhgce__u:1209: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:1210: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
GE07bhgce__u:1212: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta
GE07bhgce__u:1213: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā
GE07bhgce__u:1215: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1217: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt
GE07bhgce__u:1222: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam
GE07bhgce__u:1223: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1225: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1228: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti madbhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati
GE07bhgce__u:1229: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī dehasamudbhavān
GE07bhgce__u:1232: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho
GE07bhgce__u:1233: kimācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate
GE07bhgce__u:1235: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava
GE07bhgce__u:1236: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati
GE07bhgce__u:1237: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate
GE07bhgce__u:1238: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate
GE07bhgce__u:1249: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa vedavit
GE07bhgce__u:1255: nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā
GE07bhgce__u:1266: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1267: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07bhgce__u:1270: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1272: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1274: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam
GE07bhgce__u:1276: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam
GE07bhgce__u:1279: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam
GE07bhgce__u:1280: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā
GE07bhgce__u:1281: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1282: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1286: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo;
GE07bhgce__u:1288: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1290: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1291: yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1292: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1293: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1294: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam
GE07bhgce__u:1295: sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:1296: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha
GE07bhgce__u:1297: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:1300: dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam
GE07bhgce__u:1301: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam
GE07bhgce__u:1302: dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
GE07bhgce__u:1303: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā
GE07bhgce__u:1305: dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1308: mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava
GE07bhgce__u:1309: dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1310: daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:1311: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1312: na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate
GE07bhgce__u:1313: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram
GE07bhgce__u:1323: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham
GE07bhgce__u:1324: idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam
GE07bhgce__u:1325: asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api
GE07bhgce__u:1326: īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī
GE07bhgce__u:1333: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1335: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān
GE07bhgce__u:1336: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu
GE07bhgce__u:1337: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani
GE07bhgce__u:1338: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:1340: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet
GE07bhgce__u:1341: etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1342: ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:1344: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim
GE07bhgce__u:1349: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1351: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā
GE07bhgce__u:1352: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:1354: śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1356: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1357: aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1361: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1362: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:1364: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1367: yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
GE07bhgce__u:1370: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1371: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat
GE07bhgce__u:1372: ijyate bharataśreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam
GE07bhgce__u:1376: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:1377: anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat
GE07bhgce__u:1380: bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:1381: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1384: kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam
GE07bhgce__u:1388: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam
GE07bhgce__u:1389: yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1390: dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07bhgce__u:1391: adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate
GE07bhgce__u:1393: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1394: brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā
GE07bhgce__u:1399: sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate
GE07bhgce__u:1400: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate
GE07bhgce__u:1401: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate
GE07bhgce__u:1402: karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate
GE07bhgce__u:1403: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat
GE07bhgce__u:1404: asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha
GE07bhgce__u:1409: kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1411: tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1413: niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama
GE07bhgce__u:1415: yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat
GE07bhgce__u:1416: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām
GE07bhgce__u:1417: etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca
GE07bhgce__u:1418: kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam
GE07bhgce__u:1421: duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet
GE07bhgce__u:1422: sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet
GE07bhgce__u:1423: kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate 'rjuna
GE07bhgce__u:1424: saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1425: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate
GE07bhgce__u:1427: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1428: yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate
GE07bhgce__u:1429: aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07bhgce__u:1430: bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kva cit
GE07bhgce__u:1433: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham
GE07bhgce__u:1434: vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam
GE07bhgce__u:1436: nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1437: tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1438: paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1439: yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate
GE07bhgce__u:1440: hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate
GE07bhgce__u:1443: jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1444: procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api
GE07bhgce__u:1446: avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam
GE07bhgce__u:1447: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān
GE07bhgce__u:1448: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam
GE07bhgce__u:1449: yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam
GE07bhgce__u:1450: atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
GE07bhgce__u:1452: aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:1453: yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1455: anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam
GE07bhgce__u:1456: mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:1462: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate
GE07bhgce__u:1463: buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:1465: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye
GE07bhgce__u:1466: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
GE07bhgce__u:1467: yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1468: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07bhgce__u:1469: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā
GE07bhgce__u:1470: sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07bhgce__u:1474: prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07bhgce__u:1475: yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1476: na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07bhgce__u:1477: sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha
GE07bhgce__u:1478: abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati
GE07bhgce__u:1482: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07bhgce__u:1483: yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1485: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1486: sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1489: śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca
GE07bhgce__u:1491: śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam
GE07bhgce__u:1495: sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1496: svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu
GE07bhgce__u:1497: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07bhgce__u:1498: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1501: sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet
GE07bhgce__u:1505: siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me
GE07bhgce__u:1506: samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā
GE07bhgce__u:1507: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca
GE07bhgce__u:1508: śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca
GE07bhgce__u:1511: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham
GE07bhgce__u:1513: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati
GE07bhgce__u:1514: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām
GE07bhgce__u:1515: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1516: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram
GE07bhgce__u:1522: atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi
GE07bhgce__u:1523: yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase
GE07bhgce__u:1524: mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati
GE07bhgce__u:1526: kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśo 'pi tat
GE07bhgce__u:1529: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata
GE07bhgce__u:1530: tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam
GE07bhgce__u:1531: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā
GE07bhgce__u:1533: sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1534: iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam
GE07bhgce__u:1535: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
GE07bhgce__u:1536: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me
GE07bhgce__u:1537: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GE07bhgce__u:1538: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1539: idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadā cana
GE07bhgce__u:1540: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati
GE07bhgce__u:1541: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati
GE07bhgce__u:1542: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1543: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaś cin me priyakṛttamaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1544: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi
GE07bhgce__u:1545: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1546: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1547: śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1548: so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07bhgce__u:1549: kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā
GE07bhgce__u:1552: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta
GE07bhgce__u:1555: ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1557: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param
GE07bhgce__u:1558: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam
GE07bhgce__u:1559: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam
GE07bhgce__u:1560: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1561: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1562: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1563: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ
GE07bhgce__u:1564: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama
